poem.body:
Adrift! A little boat adrift! And night is coming down! Will no one guide a little boat Unto the nearest town?
So sailors say - on yesterday - Just as the dusk was brown One little boat gave up it's strife And gurgled down and down.
So angels say - on yesterday - Just as the dawn was red One little boat - o'erspent with gales - Retrimmed it's masts - redecked it's sails - And shot - exultant on!
